response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. We understand its importance to you, valued at $800,000, and we aim to provide a fair transaction. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits this product offers, we propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer aims to ensure a mutually beneficial agreement, allowing us to recover the investment and continue providing high-quality products to the market. We look forward to discussing this opportunity with you further.", "product_price": 950000}
